title: Sri Lanka’s first ever Floating Restaurant launches at Beira Lake
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Sri Lanka’s first ever Floating Restaurant named “Pontoon North 8” launched at Beira Lake, Colombo-02 on 19 December. The grand opening of the Floating Restaurant took place under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa….
